objective_summary: The main research objective of the paper by Mehta et al. (1991) is to investigate methanol biosynthesis using covalently immobilized cells of Methylosinus trichosporium, focusing on both batch and continuous studies. The research approach involves the immobilization of the methanol-producing cells and conducting experiments under different conditions to understand the efficiency and dynamics of methanol production.
title: Mehta et al. 1991
